2021.title: Selenium
2021.description: Selenium is an open-source umbrella project for browser automation tools and libraries supporting web application testing. It includes Selenium WebDriver for writing tests in multiple languages (Java, Python, C#, etc.), Selenium IDE for record/playback, and Selenium Grid for distributed testing. Key advantages include platform independence, CI/CD integration, and being license-free. It's particularly valuable for reducing time-to-market and enabling continuous integration efforts.:cite[1]

2021.title: OWASP ZAP (Zed Attack Proxy)
2021.description: OWASP ZAP is an open-source web application security scanner that helps identify vulnerabilities from the OWASP Top 10 2021 list. It provides both automated scanning and manual testing tools for security risks like broken access control, cryptographic failures, and injection vulnerabilities. ZAP supports testing of new 2021 categories including insecure design and software integrity failures.:cite[7]

2021.title: GhostLab by GhostQA
2021.description: An innovative low-code automation tool that bridges manual and automated testing. It allows creating tests without coding skills (using plain English) while supporting websites, mobile apps, APIs and desktop applications. Features include CI/CD integration, historical test analysis, team management, and integrations with JIRA/MS Teams. It's particularly useful for manual testers transitioning to automation.:cite[3]

2021.title: JetBrains QA Tools
2021.description: In 2021.3 update, JetBrains introduced enhanced Selenium support including visual page object class maintenance, Selenium 4 compatibility, and Python template support. Their Test Automation Kit added multilevel test run hierarchies, shared test steps in Markdown, and improved test data generation with customizable prefixes/suffixes.:cite[5]

2021.title: OWASP Top 10 2021
2021.description: The updated security standard introduced three new categories (Insecure Design, Software/Data Integrity Failures, SSRF) and reorganized existing risks. It emphasizes root causes over symptoms, with Broken Access Control moving to #1 position. The standard guides QA teams in prioritizing security testing efforts and tools selection.:cite[2]:cite[6]:cite[9]

2021.title: CHI Software QA Services
2021.description: A comprehensive QA service provider offering both manual and automated testing for web/mobile/desktop applications. Their 2021 ISO-certified process includes requirements analysis, test planning, case design, execution with tools like Selenium, and continuous monitoring. Specializes in balancing automated regression/load testing with manual exploratory/usability testing.:cite[10]

2021.title: Selenium WebDriver Courses
2021.description: Popular 2021 training programs for Selenium WebDriver with Python/Java, including 'Selenium Python Automation Testing from Scratch + Frameworks' (18.5 hrs) and 'Selenium WebDriver With Java - Basics to Advanced' (133 hrs). These cover test frameworks, CI integration, and real project applications, reflecting industry demand for automation skills.:cite[8]

2021.title: TestRail
2021.description: Test management tool that in 2021 added enhanced dashboards for tracking OWASP Top 10 security testing progress. Integrates with Selenium for automated test case management and provides traceability matrices for security requirements.:cite[10]

2021.title: Appium
2021.description: Open-source test automation framework for mobile applications that gained increased integration with Selenium in 2021. Allows reuse of Selenium WebDriver tests for mobile platforms, supporting the growing need for cross-platform testing.:cite[1]

2021.title: Sikuli
2021.description: Visual automation tool often integrated with Selenium in 2021 for testing complex UI elements through image recognition. Particularly useful for testing responsive designs across different screen resolutions.:cite[1]

2021.title: ExtentReports
2021.description: Advanced reporting library frequently paired with Selenium in 2021 for generating interactive HTML reports with dashboards, historical trends, and OWASP vulnerability tracking.:cite[1]

2021.title: Jenkins
2021.description: CI/CD server that saw increased integration with QA tools in 2021, particularly for executing Selenium test suites as part of deployment pipelines and monitoring OWASP security scan results.:cite[8]
